name: SARSCoronavirus2AntibodiesQualitativeAndQuantitative
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 Antibodies, Qualitative and Quantitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to qualitative and quantitative detection of antibodies against SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in blood, serum or plasma.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of antibodies against SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in blood, serum or plasma.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
